scMiko

Single-cell RNA-seq analysis toolbox. Builds upon Seurat Package.

Visit scMiko site for documentation.

Installation

Firstly, please install or update the package devtools by running

install.packages("devtools")

Then the scMiko package can be installed via

devtools::install_github(
    repo = "NMikolajewicz/scMiko",
    ref = "master",
    auth_token = "a3c1c9b15c496991c952d1fe3ccc52db770f22fa")
